review_title: okay for cheeks, pass on lips
review_content:
I purchased the mini version in Werk & it’s cute and worth the price but only good on the cheeks. I used this on my lips and the texture was a little waxy and the color faded quickly (surprisingly so because the blush on cheeks is very pretty) It’s not as pigmented as other cream blushes so when you apply on cheeks and blend it out, it will disappear on the first swipe. I find that it works best if you sweep it across your cheek bones twice, lightly blend, then go back & dot the product on the apples of the cheeks & pat to soften. The mini is great to keep in your purse as a quick touch up for cheeks only.

review_title: moisturizing, nice color but doesn't last very lon
review_content:
I decided to try this product after seeing janaydaily use it in her everyday make up video, and really wanted to try it! I've never really though that I could wear blush since most I've seen are really light, pale pinks, which I wasn't a fan of. But I love this deep purple color, and that it can be used on your lips and cheeks! It's a kind of sheer color, but easily buildeable! It also kinda smells like berries. I really like using this on my lips, it's really moisturizing, and when it dries down, leaves kind of a stain. It doesn't really seem to last too long on my cheeks, like powder blush does, but it gives a really natural glowy effect which I wanted! And it's easy to apply directly or with a brush. There is also a lot of product in this. I've had this for about 6 months and have barely used up any of it. I would recommend this product, just wish it lasted longer on the cheeks.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I have been eyeing this product for ages as I have been getting so into cream blushes lately, and it was so perfect that Sephora was offering a sample for their birthday gift. The colour is the perfect everyday nude, it looks a bit darker in thé tube but when applied to the cheeks is gorgeous. I don’t recommend using it in the lips, of course you can try, as it is a bit drying. If you want I may tap the product on your lips and top with a gloss. At first I was iffy because I feel it didn’t blend the best when the stick is applied straight to the face, so I found the best technique is rub your finger in the blush, using the warmth of your finger and dab onto the face, then you can blend out with your fingers a brush or sponge. The little milk birthday kit is very valuable, as the mini blush itself retails for $20 Canadian, and you don’t need to purchase the biggest size because the mini comes with so much product. I would highly highly recommend.

review_title: Great, But Not Great On Top Of Foundation
review_content:
I've been using this product, almost everyday, for over a year now and I'm not even half-way done. After enough experimentation, I've decided that I like it on top of clean skin but not on top of foundation. I assume because it's more watery and jelly, it must do something to foundation that lifts the product. I say this because every time I've attempted to put it on top of my foundation (Charlotte Tilbury or Fenty) my foundation lifts, and I have to do my face all over again. I've decided it only works on bare skin. With that being said, when I am going for a more natural make up look I really like it. :)

review_content:
I love creamy products, I think they look more natural, fresh and less powdery, this is why I decided to try this one. First of all it’s vegan and cruelty free and big thumbs up on that. The product itself looks very natural, looks like you’re naturally blushing, it’s satin, has a tiny tiny bit shine what makes it look healthy. I can’t say that there’s something that I don’t like about this product, the only feedback is that it doesn’t really last whole day, so you have to touch up definitely. For 28$ you get a LOOOOT of product that will last years, even the mini version will last more than a year. I give it 4 stars just because it’s not very long lasting (as I said before). Is it a must have in your makeup bag? I don’t think so, but If you are a creamy product lover than you should definitely try this out, you’ll love this.

review_content:
I have and use both Perk and Werk regularly and they are quite possibly my favorite blushes on the market! Their creamy/oily consistency wears and lasts all day. I don’t use it on the lips because it does have a bit of an oily feeling to it, which I don’t think feels quite nice in the lips, but it does still pack color for those who don’t really mind the feeling to it. I use these blushes every day and literally the tube still looks like I’ve hardly used it - this product will last a seriously long time.

review_content: I got this product as a birthday gift and the taste, the smell, the everything is soo terrible I had to take it off asap and still I couldn’t get the taste out of my mouth and just from putting it on my lips..

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: Great cream blush and eyelid color!
review_content:
I picked this for my birthday freebie and I am loving this little stick! I smudge it on my cheeks and then blend with my Tati Blendiful. The color is so pretty! I also swipe some on my eyelids and it really brings out my brown eyes with minimal effort! I have light skin with a lot of red pigmentation, but this blush stick still complements my complexion really well! I want to look into the bronzer stick next since i feel like these could make a great duo!

user_specs: ['Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I LOVE it. I Use the shade 'Quickie' on my lips for an everyday moisturized tint that makes me feel like I've actually got some color on my lips. Don't really use it for cheeks though.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: This is by far my favorite blush, I love how sheer and dewy it looks. I usually apply it to my fingers first and then checks, it's really easy to blend out.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: Very good- looks natural and stays on all day :) Definitely recommend for people who want a cute natural blush- I used it without foundation or primer as a base and it went on really smooth.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Like the product for cheeks, even though I don’t usually put cream blushes on, this didn’t cause my foundation to streak or do anything weird. Only problem is using this for lips, the consistency almost feels chalky, not moisturizing but that didn’t bother me much. Awkward to apply to lips tho, packaging is cute but have to use a lip brush

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I've been using this for a couple of months now mainly as a cheek color. The stick tends to take off my foundation a little bit but I'm not complaining, it's a very subtle cool shade for my skin tone (neutral medium). I like the ease of the application with the stick so it's a nice item to take on the go.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: I was excited to try this (werk in dusty rose) and liked the color but it made my cheeks itchy and hot, and I got little red bumps where I applied it... and then I checked the ingredients – and found many that clog pores, no wonder. It's too bad, I really wanted to like this.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: I really like this blush! It's creamy and I think the color complements my skin well. The only downside is that sometimes it's hard to blend out without being rough or it's hard to blend it in without disturbing my base, but those aren't too big of issues. Otherwise, I'd totally recommend it!

user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: I got this as a sample and am very impressed. I once tried the bite beauty multistick and was sorely disappointed. This stick is so much better! Super easy to blend on the cheeks (great color for fair skin) and doesn’t dry out my lips at all. It feels like a nice balm. I can see this lasting a while in full size so I would consider forking out $40 eventually!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Creamy, smells amazing, goes on beautifully,color is great, lasts all day!

review_content: I got it as a bday sample. I've never used cream blushes and didn't think I'd like it. I was wrong. It looks stunning. I'll buy another when I run out.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: Easy to apply, beautiful natural color, lovely finish. Sometimes I find that you have to layer the color for it to be more vibrant and to last longer. One layer for me is too subtle and I need color on my face lol. :') I have the mini size btw.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: Y’all don’t understand. I love the “sunburnt” look and this one product Does. It. All. I have repurchased this a million times - I would stick to the smaller version though and the product lasts forever.
Great cream blush, goes on smooth and I love the color

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Auburn', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I have been an ardent fan of benefit dandelion but for winters my cheeks tend to dry up in harsh weather so a powdery blush worsens the situation..this product came to my rescue as it’s easy to apply..perfect tone for natural rosy tint..makes you look dewy..haven’t used much on the lips though!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: 3 stars because it gives my skin a 'Healthy natural looking glow' but it does Not last and is too sheer. My skin is very dry so i cannot use powder. Perhaps Milk can add something to this to make it last. Pretty though-it has a little sparkle too (not too much, just enough) so I have not returned it because it does look good. I put it on OR reapply just before I go somewhere special.
